name: Project Double
description:
Story:

 Project Double is an action plataformer game where we have Matthew. Matthew is a human who after the sad loss of his husband decided to start a cloning project that turned against him and imprisoned him for years. Embark on this journey of liberation and self-discovery with Matthew and have fun!

The goal and the endings:

 The goal of this game is simple. Jump on plataforms and exit the factory you can even kill the clones or no.. it's up to you!  This game has 2 endings and they are decided by a small decision right at the beginning of the game... catch the robot or no?

Inspirations:

 Project Double is my first game and it wasn't inspired by just one game but by the plataform genre in general and by several devs and artists that I admire and get inspired by.

Gameplay:
  • Keyboard

Movement and Jump: AD // Spacebar

Shoot and Interact: MRIGHT and MLEFT

Hotkeys: ESC for menu // R for restart // CTRL + F for Fullscreen Mode // Spacebar for pass the dialogues and texts

  • Controller

Movement and Jump: Controller Analog Stick // Button A

Shoot and Interact: Controller Triggers

Credits:

I did everything for the game from its game design to its programming but i had the help of this background asset!
